EmailTemplate.name: October 12 Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: October 12 Webinar: A New Look at Business Models for Digital Health
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope this email finds you well. Livongo Chief Medical Officer, Dr. Jennifer Schneider, was invited to participate in an upcoming webinar, A New Look at Business Models for Digital Health, and I thought it might be interesting to you.
Separately, I'd love to touch base and see how things are going at {!Account.Name}. Are you available for a phone call the week of October 16?
More information on the webinar can be found here.
Let me know.
Thanks,
Adam Claypool Director of Commercial Operations Livongo m: 314.346.2964 o: 312-357-5285 x143 e: aclaypool@livongo.com a: 444 N. Michigan Ave., Ste 2880, Chicago, IL 60611 www.livongo.com
